t: 1:5*r Some Hb mss, Tg, Syr; other Hb mss, LXX, Vg read but there was
2:3*r Some Hb mss, LXX, Syr, Vg; other Hb mss read Huram; 2Sm 5:11; 1Kg 5:1–2
3:1*r LXX; Tg reads the angel of the Lord; MT reads he
3:3*r Tg reads The measurements which Solomon decreed
3:3*r Lit length - cubits in the former measure  —
3:11*r Lit five cubits, also in vv. 12,15
3:12*r Syr, Vg; MT reads the one
3:15*r Syr reads 18 cubits (27 feet); Hb reads 35 cubits (52½ feet)
